content: AG 500-20SE Angle grinder Variable speed angle grinder with slide switch for cutting and grinding in metal, concrete, and masonry with discs up to 5” ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Upgraded safety features – new 3D Active Torque Control (ATC) for better protection against angle grinder kickback in any direction High-performance cutting and grinding – Hilti Smart Power technology automatically adjusts power output to suit the material, helping to deliver consistent performance and protecting the motor from overload Lower vibration optimized for comfort – non-slip grip area on the back of the tool and soft-grip side handle Powerful brushless motor – 14 amp brushless motor and digital speed dial help you work faster and more efficiently Quick-acting brake stops the disc within a few seconds – ideal when working in cramped conditions Applications Cutting steel, concrete, and masonry Rough grinding and fine finishing metal, concrete, and masonry Removing coatings on cement and screed Renovating joints Slitting (chasing) using two discs (DC EX 125/5 slitting hood required, available separately) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Disc diameter: 5 in No load RPM: gear 1: 3000 rpm; gear 2: 4000 rpm; gear 3: 5000 rpm; gear 4: 6000 rpm; gear 5: 7500 rpm; gear 6: 9400 rpm Trigger type: Constant on Technical Data | Disc diameter | 5 in | No load RPM | gear 1: 3000 rpm; gear 2: 4000 rpm; gear 3: 5000 rpm; gear 4: 6000 rpm; gear 5: 7500 rpm; gear 6: 9400 rpm | Trigger type | Constant on | Disclaimer | Use specific guard depending on selected disc ### ITEMS- 3898406 - AG 500-20SE + Kwik Lock - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x AG 500-20SE 120V Angle grinder - 1x Wrench - 1x 5/8 D45 Flange inside - 1x Flange 5/8 D45 outside - 1x Threaded stud - 1x Comfort side handle - 1x 125-P88 Protective cover assy - 1x 5 Clip-on front cover - 1x Kwik lock 5/8 - 11
